org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.core.connection

类 MasterSlaveConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.adapter.WrapperAdapter
      • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.unsupported.AbstractUnsupportedOperationConnection
        • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.adapter.AbstractConnectionAdapter
          • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.core.connection.MasterSlaveConnection
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AutoCloseable, Connection, Wrapper

    public final class MasterSlaveConnection
extends AbstractConnectionAdapter
    Connection that support master-slave.
    作者:
    zhangliang, zhaojun
